translation.text: Eastern Suburbs & Illawarra Line, South Coast Line - Delays

Train services are resuming on the T4 Eastern Suburbs and Illawarra between Bondi Junction, Cronulla and Waterfall after a train requiring mechanical repairs at Redfern earlier.

South Coast Line services have also resumed operating Between Central and Bondi Junction.

Continue to allow additional travel time as some flow on delays may be experienced.

Please listen to announcements, check information screens for service updates as stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice
Airport & South Line, Bankstown Line, Inner West & Leppington Line - Delays

due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Redfern earlier.

Allow extra travel time, listen to announcements and check station information screens for service changes.
Be weather wise and avoid rushing and stepping in puddles to prevent slips, trips and falls.

A-League: Western Sydney Wanderers v Newcastle Jets - Bankwest Stadium, Parramatta
19:05 to 21:00
- The stadium is a 15 minute walk from Parramatta station via Church St and Victoria Rd.
- Fans are encouraged to consider all the available travel options ahead of time as public transport continues to operate at a reduced capacity to maintain physical distancing across the network.

For details visit https://transportnsw.info/events/2021/01/league-western-sydney-wanderers-v-newcastle-jets

The escalator from the concourse to Devonshire Street is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 1777.
The lift between platforms 1/2, concourse and mezzanine level is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, ask staff or phone 9379 4432.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 1 & 2 is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask staff or call 9752 8493.

From 11 January to the end of December 2021, the escalators and staircase connecting the corner of Pitt Street and Eddy Avenue with the Grand Concourse and L1 Light Rail stop will be closed due to station upgrade works. 

To access the Grand Concourse and Platforms 1-12 from the street level, please use the Western Forecourt entry via Pitt Street. 

To access Platforms 16-25 from the street level, please use the Eddy Avenue entry. 

To access Pitt Street or Eddy Avenue from the Grand Concourse or L1 Light Rail stop, please exit the station via the Western Forecourt or Northern Concourse.

There are changes happening at Central Station during Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may be limited, which means using different stairs, escalators and lifts. 

Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. 

For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform.

There are changes at Sydenham station during Sydney Metro construction.

T3 Bankstown Line services to the City are available from platform 3 and to Lidcombe and Liverpool from platform 4.

A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5.

If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
